Publication Title: Predictive data-driven modeling of C-terminal tyrosine function in the EGFR signaling network
Publication Authors: Jacqueline S Gerritsen, Joseph S Faraguna, Rudy Bonavia, Frank B Furnari, Forest M White
Publication Abstract: The epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) has been studied extensively because of its critical role in cellular signaling and association with disease. Previous models have elucidated interactions between EGFR and downstream adaptor proteins or showed phenotypes affected by EGFR.
